events.comment: Initially, start dropping to fill the level up, and marking it first pass so the first lot of 'scores' don't count, it's just whittling randomly generated lines out.
New block state. Reset the bonus multiplier

event-group.description: Beginning of a new group of drop/removes. Resets the bonus multiplier
event-group.title: NewBlock State

event-group.description: The objects are dropping. Switches into STATE_REMOVE or STATE_WAITSWAP depending on Match 3 line sizes at the end of the drop.
event-group.title: Dropping State

sub-events.comment: Check to see if the dropping has finished. No moving objects, at least 8 of them (optimisation) then check the grid is full
Check for matches. If there is a line of three or better, go to remove objects state.
No line of 3 or better, so we give the option to swap two adjacent objects around

events.comment: Removing objects that are now aligned, then re-enters the dropping state

event-group.description: This is the state that 'processes' removals.
event-group.title: Removing State

sub-events.comment: Run this the first time. Decide H or V randomly initially

variable.comment: H or V depending on choosing H or V
variable.name: chooseType

sub-events.comment: If H longer than V choose H
If V longer than H choose V
These process H and V - pick any item with that number of copies, pick one of them randomly, then call function to delete them.
When all explosions complete, go back to dropping state
When particle is destroyed, reduce the counter.
Function destroys items from (x,y) in direction (dx,dy), n times : params are (x,y,n,dx,dy)
For each of the values of n
Find the item there
First time round, just destroy it. We zip through this.
Otherwise increment explosion count, wait a little while, fade the item and start an explosion

event-group.description: This handles the drag and drop up till the point where a legal drop is performed.
event-group.title: Wait for Swap state

sub-events.comment: First time only, mark as not running (no touch in progress) and destroy any movers
On touch start
Pick an item orientated around the centre adjustment of the touch point (due to collision box size) bring item to top
If we are dragging, update the position
Touch end
Pick an item which is at the touch point (centre adjusted again)
Eliminate the dragged one, this probably picks two. If so, then mark details about the item to swap with
If it is only one space horizontal or vertical, swap them over
If more than one space or diagonal, return original item
If not dragged over item, return original item
Wasn't over an item, return original piece
On destroying the moving object manager
If swapped
Check to see if it creates a match 3, if so, start dropping and scoring
Otherwise return the two items to their original point

events.comment: Object who moves item from one place to another
